title:
I-40 heading north right before the Gordon Rd. exit has a hump in it that is incredibly harsh.  The road had been paved, but that part (and consequently part of the Gordon Rd. exit) appears to have been patched but not smoothed down, and it is REALLY rough!  Can you please find out if the DOT plans to fix it any time soon?  



Thanks for your help!!
